featured.text: Forced to quit school in fifth grade after his father died, Abate worked as a shoe-shine boy for years.
He quit photography right after the publication of The Decisive Moment.

definition.zh_def: 停止或放棄某項活動或工作。
definition.en_def: To stop doing something or to leave a job or position.
definition.example: She decided to quit her job to pursue her passion for art.
